meta_data.description: Adult or older actors usually play high schoolers in movies and on TV for multiple reasons. The first is probably performance-based. Experience is always important so the older the better, in general. There's also looks. Teen actors aren't done growing so their look could change from season to season on a TV series. And then there are things like child labor laws that prevent minors from working too many hours, or on weekends... Things like that. The real reason adults play teens is — it's just easier.Plus, audiences don't care. As you'll see in the slideshow ahead, many adult actors who play teen characters look the part. They may act too mature or wear makeup too perfectly, but suspension of disbelief is a powerful thing. And that's why they call it ACTING! Let's take a look at some of the best examples of older actors playing younger or teen characters, both in the movies and on TV.
